1.content:
The complex underneath Denver airport stretches for miles underground. There are so many compartmentalized labs many of them are unaware of each other's existence, even as they affect each other with their methods and achievements.

With the collection of so many fringe elements in one space, strange things can happen. Some times catastrophic.

Choose your lab:
1.title: Everyone Starts From 1

choices: She can manifest thoughts in other people
She can copy attributes of others
She can alter reality with her emotions
11.content:
Karen didn't really like the mysterious complex she was bunking in. There were no windows, and the entire building had an oppressive air about it. She was constantly getting lost in the myriad of similarly shaped corridors, even though for the past month she had spent most of her time in the same 300m radius.

Karen was an empath. From a young age her grandma had taught her some basic astrology skills, and Karen combined those with a keen sense of body language and emotional receptivity to a point where she began to attract the attention of a few local news casts. Not a week later, she got an invitation to a special academy offering to hone these skills.

At first, she really enjoyed the program, the people who were running the program had an itinerary of events and studies that Karen would never believe people could get funding for. There were courses on remote viewing, telepathy training, and these strange breathing exercises that reminded Karen of yoga, except that afterwards she would always get extremely disoriented.

Soon the program started to get weird. Clearly some of the other participants were feeling strange effects from the courses as well, but the studies just got stranger. Karen refused to be a part of one project where a specialist came in to do touch therapy. Karen got a very strange vibe off of the man, and watching the first volunteer starting to bleed out his ears was too much. Karen stood up to protest and was quickly ushered out of the room.

At this point Karen was moved to a separate group. They were gathered around some occultic symbols drawn on the ground. Karen understood a few of the signs to be astrological, having to do with Saturn and the Sun. The man leading the group talked about contacting extradimensional forces through emotional concentration. Karen's mind was still reeling from the previous course and began to drift off.

In her hazy half sleep she saw a shadowy figure behind the man talking in the center of the geometric pattern. The shadowy figure moved towards Karen with a sharp clarity that contrasted with her drowsy state. It didn't say anything, but rather seemed to be considering Karen.

Karen half reached out to the shadowy figure, and as she did it quickly reached out and grabbed her arm. Karen would have screamed if she wasn't asleep. The feeling of the creatures arm was sharp and frightening, but momentarily Karen realized that the feeling was actually information being transferred into her.

She woke up with a start, back in her own room. Judging by the snoring of the three other girls, it was night time. Karen still felt extremely out of sorts, realizing she had a feverish amount of sweat pouring off of her. Her head began pounding with an unfamiliar weight. What she didn't realize is that she had been altered in a very significant way:
11.title: Paranormal Studies

111.content:
The blurry headache passed, and Karen got up and went to the washroom. She splashed her face with water, trying to dissipate the strange feeling in her head. She could feel everything around her, like there was a giant static charge to everything around her. She could feel the guards walking outside the washroom before they knocked on the door.

"Are you alright in there Karen?"
Karen heard the words, but felt the underlying unease and fear in their voices. She wished they were calmer.
"I'm fine, just needed to pee."
'I wish you'd go away' she thought.

And just like that she felt them walk down the hall. Karen was very excited about this new ability. She closed her eyes and started to feel the space around her. She spread her mind past the walls of the bathroom, finding the girls in the room across the hall, before finding her room with her bunk mates. She then probed down the hall, finding a few more rooms, the empty class room, and then a hidden staircase she had never known was there! Excitedly she passed through the staircase to a level above.

On the upper level the energy was much different. Karen scrunched her face... it felt like pins and needles in the first room. It felt like it was empty but Karen hesitated.

'No' she thought 'It feels like something is hidden. I want you to show yourself'

And again she had felt as though she had affected something. The feeling of pins and needles began to unfold in her brain. It was all Karen could do to keep from screaming. A large voice boomed in her ears 'You do not hold jurisdiction over this space!' Karen staggered around the washroom trying to fend off the vertigo that was taking over her balance. 'I suggest you go back to bed little girl.' The voice was a command. Karen started to walk down the hall to her bedroom before she regained some measure of self control.

Karen sent a thought to the receding feeling in her brain. 'Tell me what you are, and give me your power.' Suddenly the feeling of pins and needles was back full bore, and Karen collapsed against the wall. The being she was communicating with was:
111.title: She can manifest thoughts in other people

1111.content:

1111.title: a djinn

11111.content:
Karen reached out with her now omniscient mind, enrapturously experiencing matter space and being to the furthest reaches of the universe. Sophia leaned in close, causing Karen to catch her breath.

11111.title: More changes

12.content:
Helen was pouring over the notes on her computer screen. She had just finished a very specific DNA program and was triple checking her notes before uploading it into the engineered virus she had injected into the lab rats, Pinky and Brian.

Helen was very good at what she did. A PhD in Bioengineering with a minor in Computer programming, Helen had been working on this project for 3 years. 3 years of unmarked flights from Newark to this remote lab. Helen understood the gravity of her work. She had signed enough non-disclosure forms that she resigned herself to never being able to talk about her work in public.

"Yet." she muttered to herself under her breath.

Though the project was extremely compartmentalized, Helen was smart enough to know what exactly the scope of the project was. The programs she was writing in the DNA would be wirelessly uploaded to the engineered viruses, at which point they would upgrade certain physical attributes while reducing others.

Helen was working on a project to create the perfect soldier. The software was still in it's earliest stages but the concept was that whatever biological unit was infected could have it's entire physiology and mental abilities altered to the desires of the controller.

Looking at the monitor, Helen opened up a rudimentary control screen. It had options to increase and decrease intelligence, physical size, and aggression. Saving her work, she clicked opened a connection with pinky. She decreased the mouse's intelligence, watching it stop feeding and instead running into the wall over and over. She then altered the physical size slider. The response was much more gradual, but she saw Pinky grow to 150% of his original size.

Setting the sliders back to the original setting, Helen sighed a troubled sigh on contemplation. She knew that her many years of work was for this moment. She had spent years working for what she knew in her heart to be a black ops project, and now was the time for her to start biting the hand that had been feeding her.

Helen rolled some of the heavy lab equipment in front of the lab door. She slid a USB key into the computer, and began copying over the virus she had on it.

Immediately alarms started ringing. Helen's initial fear was replaced with adrenaline as she prepped a syringe with a small amount of clear fluid.

"Now or never" she said even as she plunged the needle into her butt. She quickly turned on her phone, and began running a much more complex version of the app she had just tested out on the mice. This phone app had a number of interesting sliders on it, all much more articulate than the one being deleted by the virus.

Helen tapped the slider for strength and density, sliding them halfway. She slid the size one a quarter of the way. Guards began to pool on the other side of the lab door, banging on it, trying to push through the mass of lab gear on the other side.

Fear was streaking through Helen's brain before a different feeling crept over her, as her clothes began to creek. 13.content:
Lee could not deal with the pressure. She had been trying to reverse engineer this one specific device for going on a decade. She had been drafted straight out of school at the top of her class. She had inherited the program as one by one the older scientists on the project began to die off.

She didn't really have contact with any of the other scientists due to the compartmentalized nature of the project, but two years ago she had 'inherited' the notes of one of her esteemed colleagues, one Otto Von Roths.

Otto's take on the project had been vastly different and meticulously documented. Lee had poured over the notes, making leaps in her ability to decipher the device. The first breakthrough was verifying that the device was indeed of extraterrestrial origin.

Lee assembled a team of systems analysts, engineers and scientists, but their concerted study of the device was causing frustration and mistrust within the group. Lee had just diffused the third meeting that had broken down into infighting and Lee was worried that she may have to replace members of the group in order to continue.

She sat down in the room with the egg like device. It looked flesh like, with a faint light pulsing underneath the surface. As near as she could tell the light's pulsing was in tune with the rotation of the earth to the nanosecond. The pulse was hypnotizing, lulling the frustration and anger out of Lee. Dizziness overcame her and she passed out.

She awoke to the sound of alarms and shouts. Looking around she realized she was still in the room with the alien computer. Only the computer wasn't there anymore. And there were guards in the room, pointing guns at her.
13.title: Alien Technology

132.content:
The cell they stuck Lee in was narrow and cold. She could barely understand what was happening around her. A captain entered the cell.

'What were you doing in the room prior to your passing out?'
'I was just looking at the computer and... I don't know I just passed out. I didn't touch it or anything!'
'no, we know that.' the captain frowned an indescript military frown. 'I'm going to show you this because it's probably in your best interest to know.'

He produced a tablet, clicked on a few icons and was playing back security video for the room with the alien computer. He fastforwarded until Lee entered the room. He then played it at normal speed.

'what were you thinking here.'
'well I was very frustrated. I felt let down and under appreciated by my team. I had just defused a fight and...'
'what about there?' the captain pointed out Lee falling into a trance and collapsing
'wow no I don't remember...'

Lee trailed off looking at the screen in horror as the alien device slid very organically over to her inert body. It then rolled up to her ear and it's mass appeared to be filtering itself in through her ear. Lee screamed and staggered back.

'are you saying that--- that thing is inside my head?!'
'well there's about two minutes of nothing happening in the video before my guards arrived. So most likely yes. Your head is now military property.'
'I'm going to need better accommodations than this!'
'young lady, we're still making sure this isnt a sabotage attempt or some sort of spy infiltration.'

Lee was so shocked at the comment she was happy when the captain left. Her mind was racing. She didn't feel any different, or did she?
132.title: Lee is taken to an interrogation cell

1321.content:
The cell was cold. This was one of lee"s pet peeve, sleeping in the cold. She could even see trails of energy trailing down the halls, it was exciting and slightly surreal.

Lee climbed back on to the cot she had fallen off. Her body was trembling with exhaustion, but her vision was starting to change too. Strange characters were flickering in her peripheral vision, and the walls around her were blinking translucent, and Lee could see through the walls. 13212.content:
Down the byzantine corridors lee presently found herself in front of a large restricted access room. With a detached self consciousness about her newfound strength, she pushed her way through the shielded doors. Inside shocked her out of her reverie.

In three tube like containers she saw what looked to be extraterrestrial forms suspended in fluid. One of them opened it's eyes and made eye contact with her. The energy patterns which seemed to emanate from thes beings swelled as a sudden torrent of information flooded Lee's mind.

She saw the various dimensions that reality operated on, and the differing energitical densities of each level. 132121.content:
The base was an abomination, lee could see it now. The energy signatures of these poor creatures stuck out because of how rotten the energy was in the rest of the building. Even looking at herself, lee could see trace amounts of this filthy energy coursing her veins.

She knew it was time to reset the structure in this place. She was part of a movement, a process of complex change that was sweeping the globe. She had no clue who else was connected to it, but she knew what she had to do. 14.content:
Anna couldn't help but feel contempt for the people around her. From the bumbling staff who couldn't see past the menial tests they ran to the faceless military grunts who were used to experiment on. It was sad that a woman of her intelligence was stuck playing mommy for these idiots playing soldier.

She paused and recomposed herself. The sneer was off her face for about 30 seconds before it crept back on. The test subject earlier today had confirmed Anna's suspicions that the drug was more than ready for military application. And of course the fact that they were stalling meant that Anna's knowledge may finally have outlasted her usefulness.

Anna smiled remembering how long it took to gas the subject. Anna knew that escaping this high tech dungeon would require a lot more than the temporary invulnerability that the drug seemed to provide. Pulling a number of catalysts from a shelf, Anna walked into her lab and locked the door behind her.

Pouring over her lab equipment, Anna work tirelessly on a new batch of the formula. Instead she focused her attention on deleting any of the relevant information on the computer, while falsifying other information as to completely undermine her project. She couldn't chance anyone coming after her. And she knew they would.

Minutes ticked by, before an alarm sounded in a far side of the base. Anna was used to the drill, all the lab equipment would power down in 2 minutes, and the complex would be on lock down. Looking back Anna saw that Marina was no longer trying to get in the door. 'All for the best' Anna thought to herself. She collected around a hundred pills from the packing machine, slipping them into ziplock pouch. She pulled one out, and with no ceremony, swallowed it.

143.content:
Anna was having trouble getting used to her new senses. The visual acuity was amazing, but if she turned her head too quickly she felt noxious. Her hearing was playing tricks on her too; she'd hear footsteps from half a mile away that sounded like they were right behind her. Not to mention she could swear she felt taller. 15.content:
Amanda blinked as the lights above her kept passing by. She was loosely aware of being carried on some sort of stretcher. She had finished her job... And something had gone wrong... The drugs were making it hard for her to recall. She closed her eyes and suddenly she was on an operating table. She barely registered the cold of the table before a new round of drugs took her into unconsciousness.

Amanda awoke part way through the surgery, surreally watching a group of masked doctors operating on her. Thank god they were professionals she thought before passing out again.

When she came to she was in a hospital bed. She had no idea how she had gotten there, or even her name at first. Slowly elements of her memory came back, but her head was feeling extremely foggy. Part of her job as a covert ops agent involved a 'reset' period where certain elements of her personality or memory were altered. Amanda had signed some sort of agreement to allow the agency to delete specific memories related to national security, but by now she could hardly remember her 14th birthday.

Amanda looked down at her bruised and recuperating body. Amanda had the figure of a born athelete, slender and tall. Though she didn't feel it at the moment, Amanda was quite sexy. Her slender waist gave way to rounded hips, and her lean torso contrasted her large sloping breasts. Amanda looked down and felt her breasts. SomethIng in her chest felt out of place.

Amanda swung her legs over the bed preparing herself to stand. The blood rushed to her head and she had to lie back down. The dizziness conceded to a faint hum that soon became an articulated voice.

'hello Amanda, this is your new guidance system, installed 48hrs ago to regulate your physiotherapy and to introduce you to your new upgrades. When you are ready your next mission will be divulged through this same system. Don't bother talking back, this transmission is one way.'

'Great.' Amanda muttered to herself as she prepared to swing her legs over the bed again.
15.title: Reprogramming

151.content:
'upgrade 1: I am actively making you stronger and faster as we speak. Essentially you will have superhuman senses for the duration of this job. Intel has been delivered regarding a rogue Mossad agent that has certain abilities and knowledge which must be secured for global security.'

You have 2 more days in your incubation period, at which point you will be ushered to the surface and given 30 days to complete your mission before your next reset.'

Peering around the room Amanda got a weird sense of de ja vu. Eager to test her new self out she hopped off the bench.
151.title: Amanda finds out about her upgrades

info.brief_description: This story is about science/magic running amuck in a secret military base.
info.description:
This story is about science/magic running amuck in a secret military base. We follow a character deep underground in the military complex under Denver airport. There are five science labs where this story takes place:

Paranormal Studies
Genetic Modification
Alien Technology
Drug Testing
Reprogramming

Paranormal Studies:

Karen is an empath. She has been offered a summer job basically being a guinea pig for some large faceless organization. The pay is really good but she has to live in the corporate barracks and practice the occult with some other test subjects. She is mediterranean/caucasian, 18, 5"3 and slightly overweight.

Genetic Modification:

Helen has been working on an eyes only viral engineering project that allows a person to create complex changes to their physiology via synthetic virus that can wirelessly receive programs from a computer in the lab. Helen is indian/caucasian, 35, 5"6 and skinny.

Alien Technology:

Lee is an systems analyst hired to reverse engineer an alien computer. Her team is on it's second year and haven't made heads nor tails of the device. Lee has become somewhat obsessed over it. Lee is asian, 27, 5"4 and skinny.

Drug Testing:

Anna is one of three scientists involved in a clandestine pharmaceutical project to create a temporary immortality pill. They are at the human testing phase, though highly illegal, they have access to a number of inmates as human test subjects. Anna is caucasian 44, 5"9 and slender build.

Reprogramming:

Amanda was a CIA spy whose life had been wiped by a neurotoxin. She is undergoing reprogramming to relearn/remember her extensive skills, while possibly receiving some sort of upgrade as well. Amanda is black, 23, 5"10 and athletic.
